title: Eli Lilly plans at least $27 billion in new U.S. manufacturing investments
content:
The move comes as President Trump emphasizes reshoring manufacturing to the U.S. and reducing reliance on foreign supply chains. 

[https://www.cnbc.com/2025/02/26/eli-lilly-to-invest-27-billion-in-new-us-manufacturing.html](https://www.cnbc.com/2025/02/26/eli-lilly-to-invest-27-billion-in-new-us-manufacturing.html)
